page.title: 02 Benson's Toffees
page.content:
Benson's toffee factory has recently been taken over by the larger company of Barker & Dobson. The product line remains similar- chocolate eclairs, toffees, boiled sweets.
The company is an important local employer of about 700 people Many of the pupils at Broad Oak High have close relatives who work there.
The local people can always tell what product is being manufactured each week by the aromas which drift over the area. The employees are allowed to eat as much as they want inside the company, but few do after the first week.
The company sends its products all over the world from Singapore to San Francisco.
